question: How do I activate my license key?
answer: Open the loader software, go to the activation section, paste your key exactly as received (no extra spaces), and click activate. Make sure you are connected to the internet during activation.

question: My key says invalid.
answer: Please double-check that you copied the key exactly as provided. Remove any extra spaces before or after the key. Restart the loader and try again. If the issue persists, a human support agent will review your case.

question: My key says already used.
answer: Keys are linked to the first account that activates them. Please ensure you are logged into the correct account. If you believe this is an error, a support agent will investigate.

question: I purchased but did not receive my key.
answer: Keys are delivered automatically after payment confirmation. Please check your email and spam folder. If you still cannot find it, a support agent will verify your purchase.

question: How long does payment verification take?
answer: Payment verification usually takes a short time. Some payment methods require manual verification. Please allow staff some time to review your transaction.

question: My payment is pending.
answer: If your payment is pending, please wait for confirmation from the payment provider. Once confirmed, your license will be delivered automatically.

question: Do you accept Amazon gift card payments?
answer:
Yes, French Amazon gift card payments are accepted. Please follow these instructions and wait for manual verification by staff.

You can buy one of the following gift cards from these sites, make sure its a **French** Amazon gift card:

- [Eneba](https://www.eneba.com/fr/amazon-amazon-gift-card-10-eur-key-france)
- [GameSeal](https://gameseal.com/amazon-gift-card-50-eur-key-france)
- [G2A](https://www.g2a.com/fr/search?query=France%20amazon)
- [Recharge.fr](https://www.recharge.fr/carte-cadeau-amazon)
- [Dundle](https://dundle.com/fr/amazon/)

Once you have the gift card, you can send it here, and I'll assist you further. Don't forget to tag @lifeisamazing_.

question: Do you accept Paypal payments?
answer:
We don't accept PayPal payments directly. However, you can purchase a French Amazon gift card using PayPal or other payment methods. Please follow these instructions and wait for manual verification by staff.

You can buy one of the following gift cards from these sites, make sure its a **French** Amazon gift card:

- [Eneba](https://www.eneba.com/fr/amazon-amazon-gift-card-10-eur-key-france)
- [GameSeal](https://gameseal.com/amazon-gift-card-50-eur-key-france)
- [G2A](https://www.g2a.com/fr/search?query=France%20amazon)
- [Recharge.fr](https://www.recharge.fr/carte-cadeau-amazon)
- [Dundle](https://dundle.com/fr/amazon/)

Once you have the gift card, you can send it here, and I'll assist you further. Don't forget to tag @lifeisamazing_.

question: Why has my Amazon gift card not been validated?
answer: Amazon gift cards require manual verification. Please allow some time for our team to review your submission. Do not resend the full code publicly.

question: Do you accept PayPal?
answer: We do not accept PayPal directly. However, you can purchase a French Amazon gift card using PayPal and send it here for manual verification.

question: Can I get a refund?
answer: Refund eligibility depends on the specific circumstances of your purchase. A human support agent will review your request.

question: I sent the wrong amount.
answer: If you sent an incorrect amount, please wait for staff review. We will verify the transaction and provide further instructions.

question: Is the software safe to use?
answer: Yes, the software is authorized by the respective game publishers. It is safe when downloaded from official sources.

question: Is this software allowed by the game developers?
answer: Yes, the mod software we provide is authorized by the respective game publishers.

question: The software is crashing.
answer: For technical issues such as crashes, please contact the official software Discord or Telegram. They provide direct technical support.

question: I am getting an error code.
answer: Please contact the official software support Discord or Telegram and provide the exact error message for faster assistance.

question: My antivirus is blocking the loader.
answer: Some antivirus programs may flag modding software incorrectly. Please contact official software support for guidance on proper configuration.

question: How long is my license valid?
answer: License duration depends on the product purchased (monthly, lifetime, etc.). Please check your purchase details or ask support for verification.

question: Can I transfer my license to another account?
answer: Licenses are usually linked to the first account that activates them and cannot be transferred. Contact support if you believe there is an exception.

question: Where do I download the software?
answer: Download links are provided after purchase. Always download from the official source provided in your purchase confirmation.

question: I lost my key.
answer: If you lost your key, please provide proof of purchase. A support agent will verify your transaction and assist you.

question: Can I use the mod on multiple accounts?
answer: License usage depends on the product purchased. Most licenses are tied to a single account.

question: Can I use the software on multiple PCs?
answer: Most licenses are tied to your account rather than your device. However, please check your product details for specific restrictions.

question: Why is my order taking so long?
answer: Most orders are processed automatically. If there is a delay, it may require manual verification. Please allow some time for review.

question: The website is not loading.
answer: Please try clearing your browser cache or using another browser. If the issue persists, inform support.

question: I sent the gift card code but no response.
answer: Gift card payments require manual verification. Please wait for staff review and avoid resending the code publicly.

question: Can I upgrade my license?
answer: Upgrade options depend on the product. Please contact support with your current license details.

question: Do you offer lifetime licenses?
answer: License types depend on the product available at the time of purchase. Please check the product description.

question: I have a technical problem not listed here.
answer: For technical issues, please contact the official software Discord or Telegram for specialized assistance.

question: I have another question.
answer: If your question is not related to activation, payment, or access, a human support agent will assist you shortly.

question: How do I contact human support?
answer: If the bot cannot fully resolve your issue, please wait in this ticket. A human support agent will assist you as soon as possible.
